name: BALLAD 30 (ALBIN)
notes:
One of the most popular sailing yachts of this size ever built in Scandinavia. An evolution of the JOKER S30(1968). After Albin Marine went out of business in 1982, the molds were aquired by the Ballad One-Design Association and leased to a number of different yards in Sweden that built a few more boats until 1998.

OE Auxiliary Power (Volvo Penta): 
Boats built / Model / HP 
1971-75 / MD 6A / 10
1976-77 / MD 6B / 10
1977-78 / MD 7A / 13
1978-84 / MD 7B / 17
1984-  / VP 2002 / 18
